Package com.cmas.view

Class SuggestionView

java.lang.Object
com.cmas.view.SuggestionView
public class SuggestionView extends Object
View class for handling suggestions made by Camp Committee Members and Staff.
Since:
2023-11-18

    static void
    approveSuggestionView(Staff staff)

    • getSuggestionsForCampView

      public static void getSuggestionsForCampView(UUID CampID)
      Displays a view of camp suggestions associated with a specified camp by printing details for each suggestion along with a number incremented based on order.
      Parameters:
      CampID - The UUID of the camp for which suggestions are to be displayed.
